name: Till Theis
body:
# Projects

## Timetable Widget

![Timetable Widget Icon](http://www.tilltheis.de/projects/timetable-widget/icon.png)  
Display your timetable on your dashboard. Never miss a class again (without wanting to).  
[Details ...](http://www.tilltheis.de/projects/timetable-widget/)

## Pile the Pieces

![Pile the Pieces Icon](http://www.tilltheis.de/projects/pile-the-pieces/icon.png)  
You know this game. Play it in your browser now without any plugins. It's implemented using the newest HTML5 technology.  
[Details ...](http://www.tilltheis.de/projects/pile-the-pieces/)

## Fullscreen Clock

![Fullscreen Clock Icon](http://www.tilltheis.de/projects/fullscreenclock/icon.png)  
Display a clock on all of your inactive screens when running an application in fullscreen mode.  
[Details ...](http://www.tilltheis.de/projects/fullscreenclock/)


# About me

My name is Till Theis and I'm a student from Hamburg, Germany.

Follow me on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/tilltheis) or visit my [GitHub](https://github.com/tilltheis) account.

If you want to get in contact with me feel free to send me some lines to the following address:  
theis.till AT gmail DOT com


# Disclaimer

Information on this website is provided without any warranty and its usage is completely at your own risk. I can not been hold responsible for usage or misusage of any data, provided here. I do not own any trademarks which may be mentioned on this site. All trademarks belong to their respective owners.
